title: Jenkins and Jonez - Petition To Fix the All-Star Game Jerseys
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - Petition To Fix the All-Star Game Jerseys
description:
The guys discuss Andrew Wiggins being named an All-Star starter, Steve Nash’s Kevin Durant-centric coaching style, the disastrous NBA All-Star jerseys, why nostalgia can’t beat Zach LaVine in a dunk contest, and much more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
